name: kube-credential
description: Production-grade credential issuance and verification system

scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.install:backend: cd backend/issuance-service && npm install && cd ../verification-service && npm install
scripts.build:all: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:backend: cd backend/issuance-service && npm run build && cd ../verification-service && npm run build
scripts.test:all: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:backend: cd backend/issuance-service && npm test && cd ../verification-service && npm test
scripts.start:all: npm run start:backend & npm run start:frontend
scripts.start:backend: cd backend/issuance-service && npm run dev & cd ../verification-service && npm run dev
